Private Attributes

ResourceCursorListItemProviderInternal * mpInternal

Detailed Description

An easy ListItemProvider that creates widgets defined in an XML file.

You can specify the XML file that defines the appearance of the views.

Definition at line 19 of file ResourceCursorListItemProvider.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gaia::ui::ResourceCursorListItemProvider::ResourceCursorListItemProvider ( gaia::core::Context *  context,
int32_t  layoutId,
gaia::storage::Cursor *  cursor,
bool  autoRequery 
) [explicit]

Constructor with default behavior as per gaia::ui::CursorListItemProvider(gaia::core::Context*, gaia::storage::Cursor*, bool).

Parameters:
contextThe context where the ListWidget associated with this ListItemProvider is running
layoutIdresource identifier of a layout file that defines the widgets for this list item.
cursorThe cursor from which to get the data.
autoRequeryIf true the adapter will call requery() on the cursor whenever it changes so the most recent data is always displayed. Using true here is discouraged.
virtual gaia::ui::ResourceCursorListItemProvider::~ResourceCursorListItemProvider ( ) [virtual]

The destructor of ResourceCursorListItemProvider.
